mapper.select: SELECT to_do_code, member_code, to_do_content, to_do_state, to_do_color, DATE_FORMAT(plan_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as plan_date, done_date FROM to_do WHERE DATE_FORMAT(plan_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{selectedDate} AND member_code = #{memberCode};

SELECT to_do_code, member_code, to_do_content, to_do_state, to_do_color, DATE_FORMAT(plan_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as plan_date FROM to_do WHERE DATE_FORMAT(plan_date, '%Y-%m') =#{selectedMonth} AND member_code = #{memberCode} ORDER BY plan_date;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO to_do( to_do_code, member_code, to_do_content, plan_date, to_do_state, to_do_color, done_date ) VALUES( (select IFNULL(MAX(a.to_do_code), 0) + 1 FROM to_do a), #{memberCode}, #{toDoContent}, #{planDate}, 0, #{toDoColor}, #{done_date} )
mapper.update: UPDATE to_do SET to_do_content = #{toDoContent}, to_do_color = #{toDoColor} WHERE to_do_code = #{toDoCode};
